KnowledgeArticleEventLog.name: KnowledgeArticleEventLog
KnowledgeArticleEventLog.description: Knowledge Article View event logs contain user activity with your knowledge base.

ArticleIdentifier.description: The id of the article. For example: 00Dxx0000001gEb.

ArticleVersion.description: The article version number. For example: 2.

ArticleVersionIdentifier.description: The 15-character ID of the article version. For example: ka0R00000005rt6.

IsLargeLanguageModel.description: Whether the article was written with an LLM.

IsLastVersion.description: True if it is the last version of the article.

Language.description: The ISO code of the language. For example: en_US/

ObjectType.description: The object requested. For example: Knowledge__kav.

RequestIdentifier.description: The unique ID of a single transaction. A transaction can contain one or more events. Each event in a given transaction has the same RequestIdentifier. For example: 3nWgxWbDKWWDIk0FKfF5DV.

SessionIdentifier.description: Session ID of the request. For example: gV7pCSW2vGaaJNFi3GSpuPIjNbKVbSxRvx34LJsIvuc=.

Timestamp.description: The access time of Salesforce services in GMT. For example, 2020-01-20T19:12:26.965Z. Milliseconds are the most granular setting.

UserIdentifier.description: The 15-character ID of the user whoâ€™s using Salesforce services through the UI or the API. For example: 00530000009M943.
